MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 postcode area of Newtown, affecting properties in School Lane, Fairfield Drive and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.57am. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.43am on 18th of Feb 2021
